HOW IT WORKS

  • Contact Us

    Call us on 1800 316 398 or complete the form to speak with one of our friendly experts. We will identify the best tyres for your vehicle, book in your tyre fitting, and guide you to your nearest Beaurepaires store.

  • Visit Nearest Store

    With over 230+ stores nationally, your nearest Beaurepaires store is just around the corner. Our in-store experts pride themselves on delivering the best advice and superior service. Click here to find your nearest store.

  • 60 minute TYRE Fit GUArantee

    Sit back and relax with a coffee in our Customer Lounge while our experts install your new tyres in under 60 minutes guaranteed! And that’s how it works!
